lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Interviewed at an agribusiness education conference here, McMinimy said that 67.6 mln planted acres of corn will likely translate into 60 mln harvested acres, and with normal yields, final production of 6.9 to 7.0 billion bushels.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "To say this represents a turn-around is wrong, but we're at least in a holding pattern," George Hoffman, director of commodity analysis for Pillsbury said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: S. grain stockpile but will at least keep grain surpluses from increasing, Agriculture Department and industry commodity analysts said.
